alert.note: Alert for Carter; Cleveland; Garvin; Johnston; McClain; Murray; Pontotoc; Pottawatomie; Seminole (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 10 at 2:50AM CDT until June 10 at 3:30AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Johnston County in southeastern Oklahoma... Eastern Garvin County in southern Oklahoma... Southwestern Seminole County in east central Oklahoma... Southeastern Carter County in southern Oklahoma... Southeastern Cleveland County in central Oklahoma... Western Pontotoc County in east central Oklahoma... Murray County in southern Oklahoma... Southwestern Pottawatomie County in central Oklahoma... Southeastern McClain County in central Oklahoma... * Until 330 AM CDT. * At 250 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Norman to 3 miles southwest of Rosedale to 5 miles south of Wynnewood to 3 miles northwest of Turner Falls to near Lone Grove, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Southeastern Norman, Ardmore, Pauls Valley, Sulphur, Davis, Lone Grove, Wynnewood, Stratford, Konawa, Dickson, Maud, Mannsville, Roff, Springer, Paoli, Ravia, Asher, Tribbey, Wanette and Mill Creek. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Carter; Cleveland; Garvin; Johnston; McClain; Murray; Pontotoc; Pottawatomie; Seminole
